definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Qatar beat Iran78-61 in the round-robin portion of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾在小組賽曾以78比61打敗伊朗。

sentences.english: The worst offender isQatar, according to several Tripoli-based diplomats.
sentences.chinese: 一些駐黎波里的外交官則最擔心卡塔爾的立場。

sentences.english: The partners are constructing what will be the world's largest aluminum plant built in one phase in Qatar.
sentences.chinese: 此次合作將完成卡塔爾最大的鋁廠一期工程的建造。

sentences.english: As the name suggests, this is an international news channel located at Doha in Qatar.
sentences.chinese: 顧名思義，這是一個位於卡塔爾多哈的國際新聞頻道。

sentences.english: We had some good training sessions in Qatar and now we've topped it off with a win against Burnley.
sentences.chinese: 我們在卡塔爾練得不錯，現在我們得戰勝伯恩利。

sentences.english: Qataris do not universally impose the style on foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾人通常不將這種形式強加於外國人。

sentences.english: Tiny Qatar is just one of the examples.
sentences.chinese: 彈丸之地卡塔爾就是一個例子。

sentences.english: In Fifa's rankings released yesterday, Qatar are 105th in the world.
sentences.chinese: 昨天非法發佈的排名，卡塔爾在世界內是105位。

sentences.english: The Karzai government initially rejected the Qatar host for peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾扎伊政府最初拒絕了卡塔爾提倡的和平談判。

sentences.english: Qatar’s culture is based on Bedouin poetry, song and dance.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾文化基於貝多因人的詩歌，歌唱和舞蹈。

sentences.english: The first meeting of the Contact Group will be chaired by the Gulf state of Qatar.
sentences.chinese: 這個聯絡小組的首次會議將會由海灣國家卡塔爾主持。

sentences.english: There are rumblings that Sepp opposed the Qatar bid.
sentences.chinese: 還有過流言說胡扯曾經反對過卡塔爾申辦。

sentences.english: This news channel is owned by Qatar Media Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 該新聞頻道爲卡塔爾媒體公司所擁有。

sentences.english: Having discovered the fraud, the channel's Qatari owners had to give him the boot.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾電視臺發現了漢法爾的詭計，因此將他開除了。

sentences.english: The tribute ended with the occupation of Qatar by the Ottoman Turks in 1872.
sentences.chinese: 進貢在1872年奧斯曼土耳其佔領卡塔爾時結束。

sentences.english: Qatar flag should be hung on board during the day.
sentences.chinese: 白天船上應掛卡塔爾國旗。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2

definition: to end a relationship/to break off diplomatic ties
